description.en:
### Itoshii Hito♡

1. Promise Breaker / Yakusoku Breaker (約束プレイカー); COMIC BAVEL 2016-01
2. Something That I, from the Anime Research Club, Can Teach That Serious Person / Majimena Aitsu ni Aniken no Ore ga Oshiete Yareru Koto (マジメな後輩にアニ研の俺が 教えてやれるコト) ; COMIC BAVEL 2016-05
3. Something That I, from the Anime Research Club, Can Teach That Serious Person 2 / Majimena Aitsu ni Aniken no Ore ga Oshiete Yareru Koto 2 (マジメな後輩にアニ研の俺が 教えてやれるコト 2); COMIC BAVEL 2016-11
4. HolyBell; COMIC BAVEL 2016-01
-Kai expects to spend another Christmas alone and by himself, but a Christmas miracle shows up in the form of his little sister’s friend, a seemingly shy and demure girl named Suzu.
5. Tsuyudaku (つゆだく); COMIC BAVEL 2015-10
-Asuka finds herself locked(?) in the gym storage room with the guy she likes. He suddenly mentions that he thinks her armpits are beautiful, and things escalate from there.
6. Usotsuki Shinryakusha (うそつき侵略者); COMIC Europa 2015-05
7. Gankake (ガンカケ); COMIC Europa 2015-03
8. The Love Song of the Nightingale / Nightingale no Renka (ナイチンゲール の 恋歌) 
9. summer of slight fever / Binetsu summer (微熱Summer) 
10. Afterschool Secret / Houkago Secret (放課後シークレット) 
11. Katakoi Irony (片恋アイロニー); COMIC Europa 2014-11
12. Kataguruma x Shoujo (日車×少女); COMIC L.Q.M ~Little Queen Mount~ Vol. 3
